awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.

fullplot: This documentary chronicles the life of Kurt Gerron, a German Jew who rose to prominence as an actor and director in prewar Germany and was eventually coerced by the Nazis into making a film portraying the concentration camp called Terezin (or Theresienstadt) seem like an ideal community of relocated Jews. A well-crafted documentary adeptly narrated by actor Ian Holm, "Prisoner of Paradise" is a fresh reminder that we should never forget what happened.
plot: Documentary about Holocaust victim Kurt Gerron.
title: Prisoner of Paradise
